title: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the shadowy corners of a post-apocalyptic world, you discover an ancient piece of firepowerâ€”the trusty shotgun. Crafted from resilient steel and warm wood, its barrel gleams ominously in the dim light, a testament to countless battles fought. This weapon is not just an instrument of destruction; it embodies survival. With each pump, the air is charged with tension, promising devastating close-quarters power. Perfect for clearing out hostile foes or dispatching lurking monsters, it offers you the advantage of intimidation and sheer force. Load it, aim true, and watch as your enemies tremble before your relentless might. The hunt begins!
